system.description:
Trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Crystal.

Effect: The user may freely move up to either their Overland Score or double their Burrow Score when declaring this attack.

Requirement: [Ground] Z-Crystal as an Accessory Item and a Ground-Type attack on the user's Active List.
